for-interested.request-1-text: I like plays like The Broken Pitcher and Nathan. What’s on in the next 2 weeks?
for-interested.request-2-text: Show me cool rock concerts in central Berlin!
for-interested.request-3-text: Post-metal and progressive rock is great. What’s on there soon?
for-interested.request-4-text: I love going to the Deutsche Oper. Are there any good performances next weekend?
for-interested.request-5-text: Standup comedy in Neukölln or Kreuzberg or Friedrichshain - Go!
